author: trawick
msg: Add some missing file lock initialization.  This should have
been added with the file buffering logic.
The lock initialization in ap_dupfile() is probably wrong
(need to share a lock with the file being duped) but Apache
should be o.k. now (no SIGSEGV at init, no problems later).

author: trawick
msg: Avoid some compiler warnings (two of which indicated logic
errors) introduced with the buffered I/O code.

author: trawick
msg: ap_set_pipe_timeout() now takes microseconds instead of seconds;
ap_interval_time_t was created to represent intervals;
Unfortunately, some compile fixes for the recently added buffering
code are mixed in with these changes.

author: fielding
msg: Restore the space that someone just ate.
